headline: What Does Cummins' (CMI) Pause in Buybacks Reveal About Its Capital Allocation Priorities?
summary: Earlier this month, Cummins Inc. announced third quarter results showing sales of US$8.32 billion and net income of US$536 million, both down compared to the same period last year, alongside an update that it made no share repurchases during the quarter. One insight is that, although Cummins continued its previously announced buyback programs, it paused repurchases this quarter, coinciding with weaker earnings performance. We'll now examine how Cummins' lower quarterly net income impacts the...
